Class Food

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item

        • game.Food
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ItemInterface

    public class Food
extends PortableItem
    Represents food in the Zombie game world.
    Author:
    Kee Pei Jiin, Tan Wei Li

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int HEAL_POINT

    • Method Detail

      • getHealPoint

        public int getHealPoint()
        Getter for heal point of the food.
        Returns:
        an integer which represents the heal point of the food

      • getAllowableActions

        public java.util.List<edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action> getAllowableActions(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                                                            edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Return a list consisting of EatingAction only if the actor is Player and has the food in his inventory. This is to make sure only Player can perform EatingAction for the food and the food must be picked up before it is able to be eaten.
        Parameters:
        actor - actor that we're interested in, i.e. owner of the list of possible actions
        map - game map the actor is currently on
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of Action
